description: Create an annotation event on the given annotation stream :name. If the annotation stream does not exist, it will be created automatically

title.description: The title of an annotation is a string and may contain spaces

start_time.description: The unix timestamp indicating the the time at which the event referenced by this annotation started

source.description: A string which describes the originating source of an annotation when that annotation is tracked across multiple members of a population

end_time.description: The unix timestamp indicating the the time at which the event referenced by this annotation ended

description.description: The description contains extra meta-data about a particular annotation
